attributes.action: Hold a referendum on the creation of a parliament for England.
attributes.additional_details:
We believe in democracy and that the current democratic settlement is unfair, unjust and discriminates against the English people.

Establishing an English parliament will rectify this intollerable situation, give voice to the most populace nation and reinforce the democratic mandate at a time where democracy is in retreat.
attributes.background: The Government should seek to establish a parliament for England and the English people to equalise devolution amongst the constituent nations that form the United Kingdom.

rejection.details:
The following petition calls for a similar action: 

Form an English Parliament
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/737748
